maatta petha pullaya 
nenaikkiromnenaikkirom
idha kodumaiya seiyya 
eppadi manasu varum
manasu varum

idhan pinne ulla sarvadesa
arasiyal viyabaram

indha vilayattai thadai seithal

ariyatha thamizha 
un ariyamai pizhaiyal 
un adaiyalam vizhudhaal
nee medhuvaga azhivai

idhu maatta pathina prachana illa
